claim: K-6 is the predominant grade span configuration among schools in Adelanto.
reasoning: The claim states K-6 is the predominant grade span in Adelanto, but the data shows K-5 is the most common grade span with 6 schools, while K-6 has only 1 school.

content.text: I'll verify this claim by examining the database schema and then querying for grade span configurations among schools in Adelanto.

input.description: List all tables in the database

content.content:

(

    MailStreet  TEXT null,
    MailStrAbr  TEXT null,
    MailCity    TEXT null,
    MailZip     TEXT null,
    MailState   TEXT  null,
    Phone       TEXT null,
    Ext         TEXT  null,
    Website     TEXT null,
    OpenDate    DATE        null,
    ClosedDate  DATE        null,
    Charter     INTEGER    null,
    CharterNum  TEXT  null,
    FundingType TEXT null,
    DOC         TEXT  not null,
    DOCType     TEXT not null,
    SOC         TEXT  null,
    SOCType     TEXT null,
    EdOpsCode   TEXT  null,
    EdOpsName   TEXT null,
    EILCode     TEXT  null,
    EILName     TEXT null,
    GSoffered   TEXT null,
    GSserved    TEXT  null,
    Virtual     TEXT  null,
    Magnet      INTEGER   null,
    Latitude    REAL      null,
    Longitude   REAL      null,

    AdmLName2   TEXT null,
    AdmEmail2   TEXT null,
    AdmFName3   TEXT  null,
    AdmLName3   TEXT null,
    AdmEmail3   TEXT null,
    LastUpdate  DATE        not null
);

content.text: I can see `GSoffered` (Grade Span offered) and `City` columns. Let me query for the grade span distribution among schools in Adelanto.

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/california_schools.sqlite" "SELECT GSoffered, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM schools WHERE City = 'Adelanto' GROUP BY GSoffered ORDER BY cnt DESC;"
input.description: Count schools by grade span in Adelanto

content.text:
The results show the grade span distribution for schools in Adelanto:

| Grade Span | Count |
|-----------|-------|
| K-5       | 6     |
| K-8       | 2     |
| (null)    | 2     |
| K-6       | 1     |
| K-12      | 1     |
| 9-12      | 1     |
| 7-8       | 1     |
| 6-8       | 1     |

The claim states that **K-6** is the predominant grade span configuration in Adelanto. However, the data shows that **K-5** is the most common grade span with 6 schools, while **K-6** has only 1 school. K-6 is far from being predominant.

```json
{"label": "CONTRADICTED", "reasoning": "The claim states K-6 is the predominant grade span in Adelanto, but the data shows K-5 is the most common grade span with 6 schools, while K-6 has only 1 school."}
```
